data: Go to camphalfblood r/camphalfblood • Responsible-Fee704 हिन्दी [General] Favorite pjo headcannons foe halfblood? My favorite headcannon(might be made up idk) is that all halfbloods might have more instincts than just the normal, like poseidon kids will naturally want to be in water than on land, maybe have a few gils.? Siren voice? Apollo kids will have a natural tiredness when the sun goes down. Even in the winter, they are almost always happy to the point its crippling, they have more prophetic dreams and healing abilities? They heal faster than others? Love to sing and so on Read more Share
